meanings.definition: Tooths (verb): to bite or chew with teeth
meanings.sent1: The puppy tooths on his favorite chew toy.
meanings.sent2: She tooths into a crunchy apple for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The baby tooths on anything within reach.
meanings.sent4: The lion tooths through the tough meat effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: He tooths carefully to avoid biting his tongue.

meanings.definition: Tooths (noun): plural form of tooth, a hard structure in the mouth used for biting and chewing
meanings.sent1: The dentist counted all the tooths in her mouth.
meanings.sent2: He brushed his tooths twice a day to keep them clean.
meanings.sent3: The tooths in the comb help detangle hair easily.
meanings.sent4: The shark's tooths are sharp and dangerous.
meanings.sent5: She lost one of her front tooths while playing sports.

meanings.definition: Tooths (adjective): having teeth or tooth-like projections
meanings.sent1: The tooths creature had a menacing grin.
meanings.sent2: The tooths edge of the saw cut through the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The tooths design of the fence made it look intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The tooths appearance of the building gave it a spooky vibe.
meanings.sent5: The tooths necklace was made of shark teeth.
